author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Music Academy that dedicated its Margazhi music festival to the flood victims has contributed Rs 25 lakh to the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund.

In a statement here, the Academy president, N. Murali, said that it also has set apart funds for providing direct assistance to musicians and artistes badly affected by the flood which will soon be disbursed after a proper assessment.

Mr. Murali said the completion of 89{+t}{+h}annual conference and concerts and its 10{+t}{+h}dance festival reflected the indomitable spirit of Chennai.
title: Music Academy contributes Rs. 25 lakh for relief
